startPage.title: Document upload proof of concept
startPage.description: This is a proof of concept for the CUI upload document journey.
startPage.whatYouNeedText2: A PCSCase reference to associate the document to
startPage.expectedBehavior: When you upload a document to the associated case reference, you should see a message confirming the document has been uploaded.
startPage.expectedBehavior2: You should see the document in the JSON structure for pcsCase table.

page2.title: Upload Documents
page2.caseReferenceHint: Upload any docuemnts that you think are relevant to your response for case reference:
page2.fileUploadHint: Give them a name that explains what they are. For example, 'Receipt of payament from Jane Smith'
page2.fileUploadHint2: Each docuemtn must be less then 1GB. You can upload the following file types: DOC/PDF.

errors.fileRequired: Please select a file to upload
